service

Class RunnerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • service.RunnerClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, RunnerServerInterface

    public class RunnerClient
extends java.util.Observable
implements RunnerServerInterface
    Created by Ali on 11/25/2016. Java RMI is used to connect to the server.

        Removes a task with a specific id

      • getTasks

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,LongTask> getTasks()
                                                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Obtains all tasks on the server
        Specified by:
        getTasks in interface RunnerServerInterface
        Returns:
        a HashMap(Integer, LongTask) in which keys are unique identifiers for tasks. Removed tasks are null but their id will be there
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
